artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait (bijin-ga); head and torso of woman under an umbrella in falling snow; woman wears a purple hood and purple flowered kimono
markings: hand-applied red artist\'s seal: 深水 {Shinsui}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
signed: hand-applied 深水畫 {Shinsui ga} (picture by Shinsui)
text: Shinsui modeled this print after his painting Spring Snow (Haru no yuki).
title: Snow Hood
